posts.post_title: Fall Clean-up Sale T206, T201 & others
posts.post_content:
Cleaning up the collection a little by selling off some cards that don't fit in the direction of my collection anymore:
(Front and back scans can be seen by clicking [URL="http://s486.photobucket.com/albums/rr225/t2069bk/FOR%20SALE/"]here[/URL])

T206 John Kling SGC 10 $17

1958 Topps Ernie Banks PSA 5 $30
1963 Fleer Bill Mazeroski SGC 80 $15

Football:
1965 Topps Kemp & 1968 Jim Taylor ($22 for both)


ON Hold/SOLD:
Hockey:
1961/2 Henri Richard & 1968/9 Gordie Howe ($20 for both)

Paypal is preferred (no fee)  Shipping is $3 no matter how many items you buy.  Front and back scans can be seen by clicking [URL="http://s486.photobucket.com/albums/rr225/t2069bk/FOR%20SALE/"]here[/URL].

I will take all of these if still available. PM to follow
